solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int rob(int[] num) {--newline--        int prevNo = 0;--newline--        int prevYes = 0;--newline--        for (int n : num) {--newline--            int temp = prevNo;--newline--            prevNo = Math.max(prevNo, prevYes);--newline--            prevYes = n + temp;--newline--        }--newline--        return Math.max(prevNo, prevYes);--newline--    }--newline--}
